diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with persistent left lower quadrant pain, diarrhea with mucus and blood, and a history of diverticulosis. Physical examination revealed tenderness in the left lower quadrant and positive guaiac on rectal exam. CT abdomen/pelvis was performed, supporting the diagnosis of diverticulitis.
